pkgmetadata.longdescription: The "demjson" module, and the included "jsonlint" script, provide methodsfor encoding and decoding JSON formatted data, as well as checking JSONdata for errors and/or portability issues. The jsonlint command/scriptcan be used from the command line without needing any programming.Although the standard Python library now includes basic JSON support(which it did not when demjson was first written), this moduleprovides a much more comprehensive implementation with many featuresnot found elsewhere. It is especially useful for error checking orfor parsing JavaScript data which may not strictly be valid JSON data.
